The Refinery creates innovative and creative short films, commercials, online media and TV programmes. From online campaigns to big budget commercials, TV programmes, conferences and events, our flexible approach means we can cater to any requirement for video. Creating engaging, compelling content is what we live for.
The Refinery is able to offer science video production, writing, interactive exhibit production and copywriting in all areas of science, engineering, health, technology and medicine.
